classification.description: Classify imagery from SEPAL or Google Earth Engine. Include imagery from multiple points in time to do change detection.

latitude.label: Latitude
latitude.tooltip: Include the latitude of each pixel.

water.label: Water
water.tooltip: Include JRC Global Surface Water Mapping Layers.

auxiliaryImagery.title: Auxiliary sources
auxiliaryImagery.tooltip: Include Auxiliary image sources in classification

ANGLE.label: Angle
ANGLE.tooltip: Include bands with the angle evaluated pair-wise between all selected bands

DIFFERENCE.label: Difference
DIFFERENCE.tooltip: Include bands with the difference evaluated pair-wise between all selected bands

DISTANCE.label: Distance
DISTANCE.tooltip: Include bands with the distance evaluated pair-wise between all selected bands

NORMALIZED_DIFFERENCE.label: Normalized difference
NORMALIZED_DIFFERENCE.tooltip: Include bands with the normalized difference evaluated pair-wise between all selected bands

RATIO.label: Ratio
RATIO.tooltip: Include bands with the ratio evaluated pair-wise between all selected bands

derivedBands.label: Derived bands

RLCMS.label: RLCMS
RLCMS.tooltip: Include bands used by the Regional Land Cover Monitoring System

SIMPLE.label: Simple
SIMPLE.tooltip: Include red, nir, swir1, swir2 and ratios between them.

derivedBands.tooltip: Add additional derived bands to use in the classification.

cloudThreshold.value: Exclude scenes with more than {value}% clouds

polygon.description: Draw a polygon on the map.
polygon.title: Draw a polygon

clearSelectedScenes.message: You are about to clear all selected scenes.
clearSelectedScenes.title: Clear selected scenes

median.label: Median
median.tooltip: Use the median of remaining pixels. Pixel value will be artificial, and metadata for mosaic will be unavailable.

medoid.label: Medoid
medoid.tooltip: Use the medoid of remaining pixels.

brdf.label: BRDF
brdf.tooltip: Correct for bidirectional reflectance distribution function (BRDF) effects.

calibrate.label: Calibrate
calibrate.tooltip: Calibrate bands to improve cross-sensor mosaic.

surfaceReflectance.label: SR
surfaceReflectance.tooltip: Use scenes atmospherically corrected surface reflectance.

dayOfYearPercentile.max: Select pixels closest to target day
dayOfYearPercentile.off: Don't filter based on day of year

filters.label: Pixel filters
filters.tooltip: Filter out pixels in selected scenes based on the below properties

clouds.label: Clouds
clouds.tooltip: Mask clouds instead of just trying to use cloud-free pixels. Can cause built-up areas to be masked out.

snow.label: Snow
snow.tooltip: Mask snow. This tend to leave pixels where with shadowy snow

none.label: None
none.tooltip: Only mask the clouds. It might leave hazy pixels around masked clouds, but will minimize the amount of maxed pixels in the mosaic.

moderate.label: Moderate
moderate.tooltip: Mask an additional 120m around each larger cloud. This helps prevent hazy pixels at the border of clouds to be included in the mosaic.

aggressive.label: Aggressive
aggressive.tooltip: Mask an additional 600m around each larger cloud. This helps prevent hazy pixels at the border of clouds to be included in the mosaic.

info.none: Don't include seasons from the future
info.number: Include {futureSeasons} {futureSeasons, plural, one {season} other {seasons}} from the future

info.none: Don't include seasons from the past
info.number: Include {pastSeasons} {pastSeasons, plural, one {season} other {seasons}} from the past

season.label: Season
season.tooltip: Restrict the time of year to include imagery for.

targetDate.label: Target date
targetDate.tooltip: The date in which pixels in the mosaic should ideally come from.

targetYear.label: Year
targetYear.tooltip: The year which pixels in the mosaic should come from.

bands.atLeastOne: At least one band must be retrieved
bands.label: Bands to retrieve

task.GEE: Export {name} as a Google Earth Engine asset

sceneSelection.noScenes: No scenes are available for the current combination of area of interest, dates and data sources. Please revise the settings in AOI, DAT and/or SRC.

balanced.label: Balanced
balanced.tooltip: Try to take images no too cloudy and not too far from the target date

cloudFree.label: Cloud free
cloudFree.tooltip: Prefer imagery as cloud-free as possible, ignoring the date

targetDate.label: Target date
targetDate.tooltip: Prefer imagery as close as possible to the target day

dataSets.label: Datasets
dataSets.oneDataSet: Selected satellite family only have a single dataset.

form.required: A data source must be selected

CUSTOM_TIME_SCAN.tooltip: Build a time-scan with data from a custom date range.

POINT_IN_TIME_MOSAIC.tooltip: Build a mosaic with data coming as close to a specified date as possible.

YEARLY_TIME_SCAN.label: Year
YEARLY_TIME_SCAN.tooltip: Build a time-scan with data from a specified calendar year.

refinedLee.label: Refined Lee
refinedLee.tooltip: Refined Lee filtering is applied. This can be very slow, but often gives good results

snic.label: SNIC
snic.tooltip: Simple Non-Iterative Clustering is used to filter out speckle

surfaceReflectance.tooltip: Use scenes atmospherically corrected surface reflectance.

snow.label: Snow
